about_the_game:
This is the demo version of Folk Tales: Ala Geyik, featuring the first chapter of the game.

Folk Tales: Ala Geyik tells the story of a lone hunter’s struggle with supernatural events during a night filled with nightmares. The hunter awakens from a terrifying dream in the dead of night, drawn to a bright light outside his home. Stepping out, he sees a deer standing before him. As the deer begins to flee, the hunter grabs his rifle and fires, but his first shot misses the mark.

Determined, the hunter chases the deer through the dark woods. After a long pursuit, he finally catches up to it and shoots it down. However, the deer miraculously rises again. As the hunter turns around, he finds himself face-to-face with a horrifying monster. Panicking, he attacks the creature, leading to a fierce and desperate fight. In the end, the monster overpowers and kills him.

At that moment, the hunter suddenly wakes up in his bed, realizing that everything he experienced might have been just a dream. Yet, the boundary between reality and illusion becomes increasingly blurred. The hunter must confront the terrors brought upon him by both the deer and Erlik in this nightmare-filled night to survive.

name: Folk Tales: Ala Geyik Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-7600K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 3700X or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Folk Tales: Ala Geyik is an action-horror game. It follows a hunter who, after experiencing a nightmare, is chased by a deer he has repeatedly killed. As supernatural events unfold, he must face the Ala Geyik in a night filled with haunting nightmares and his struggle for survival.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
